extension.name: DisplayModeIcons
extension.author: François Guillet, Nik Trevallyn-Jones, Petri Ihalainen
extension.description: This plugin adds a set of icons to the menubar of every editing view. The icons provide quick selection of display-, perpective- and navigationmodes.

history.log: - Fixed navigation down menu width - Added text to navigation menu items. - Added adaptive tool tip texts - Added translations

- Added Align to Axes icon - Renewed perpective icons - Reordered the icons to match the logic of plain AoI - Perspective selection with new icons and drop down menu - Disabled mode changes by icons while performing view changes
- Bug fix. Made compatible with boolean modelling window. (The 'rendered' option was not available in the menu. The attempt to remove it prevented opening the window.)

- Icon for the 'rendered'-mode added. The plugin removes 'rendered'-mode from the menu. - The menu items set the mode for all the views in a window. - Now the menu has the same behaviour in all editing windows, not just the scene window.
- Changes for compatibility with AOI 2.7 - Fixed a problem that could show up if other ViewerControls had been installed (by another plugin)
